column9: Worst service ever. The cheese was in bad shape and the staff didnt notice, they gave advice that seemed to come read right off a paper. Bad atmosphere in the shop, something isnt right here. I dont recommend.

column7: they have a great selection of wine and cheese
column9: good prices, a huge selection of cheese and o good selection of wine. always helpful and answer questions and give advice

What was once a great cheese shop now has snobby people behind the counter and the charm has gone. I preferred when it was a small shop on the other side of the road, which, although it was a bit of a squeeze was worth...More
Don't know HOW long this shop has been around, but not to miss it - cheese from all over the world, just the interior and the smells are worth a visit.

column7: This is a good place for relax.

I went to Bengstons to buy some cheese. I was overwhelmed with the variety and pleasantly surprised with the helpful and cheerful help I received from the stafff. I recommend this restaurant/shop if you would like to try high quality food.
